title: rAma dEva
sahitya:
rAma dEva nInallade jagake innAva kAvaruLLara


anupallavi

  dEvara dEva nInendu nambida enna kAyO kanakAcala krSNa karuNadi


caraNam 1    tandeya toDeya mEle bandu kuLitidda kandana malatAyiya nUkalu 
andu shishuvu aDavige naDediralu bandu poredayO nI karuNadali
    caraNam 2    nakha mukhadali hiraNyakanoDalanu sILi rakutava dese deseke cellalu 
sakala suraru koNDADalu jyavendu bhakuta prahlAdana porede karuNadi
    caraNam 3    shakaTa pUtani dhEnuka vrtrAsura baka mukyaranella savarideyo 
prataTakanadi kamsana neggotti dEvaki vasudEvara porede karuNadhi
    caraNam 4    ati capaladi dushyAsana sabheyali patigaLaivaru edurinoriLu 
gatiyindali seLeye sIreya taraLa dreLa patiyabhimAnava porede karuNadi
    caraNam 5    maraNa kAladali ajamiLa marukada taraLa nAraganendu kareyalu 
neredu porede karuNAgaLugaLarasane guru purandara viTTala karuNadali
